name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (CataStoicaSoftware)
description:
This game is demo !!

In this game you have to escape from the dungeon where you were trapped.
Along the way you will encounter strong opponents, but you have to face them all.

This game is in development, so if you have new ideas / improvements, I will implement them.
I want an opinion about the idea of the game. Any opinion is welcome.

I will also release a version for android and ios.

Have fun !
